infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need your permission to use your camera
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need your permission to access your photo library
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We need your permission to save photos to your photo library
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your permission to access your location when the app is running
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need your permission to access your location even when the app is in the background
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need your permission to access your location at all times
